tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The dental consulting and explanation was excellent from the doctor.

Dr handed my son very good by speaking things which my son likes and treatment was done without any much uncomfortable and without cry. The kid is was very happy with the treatment.

We are very much satisfied with the care and the treatment they had given to my kid. My kid felt most comfortable that they gave the clarity of the treatment before and after the complete process. Dr is very friendly and excellently analysing the problem. I would definitely recommend the clinic to my friends and relatives. Extremely great support even after treatment.Timely replies to any queries raised even after treatment!!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable time and feedback it means a lot sir........

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
1) understands the root cause of the issue very well 
2) Listens to patients dental problems and provides exact solution .
3)  will not suggest any unnecessary treatment . Doctor also tries to protect the existing tooth . I've seen many dentists  just extract tooth for small issues rather than trying to protect it . 
4) Really felt we are in safe hands during the treatment .
reply_text: THANK YOU FOR YOUR VALUABLE FEEDBACK SIR .....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
It was great. He did have great expertise at the task. I mean my tooth wasn't even visible at the first place to be extracted, but with the skill he pluked, really appreciable.
Best part was he was keeping me in loop with what he was about to do next, that way I was prepared before hand regarding what to exepect next. The way he made me feel calm and comfortable was again a plus point for me to sustain through the process. So yes, definitely a 10/10 for the doctor. But the cost did feel pricey, as I was informed it to be lesser, the previous time I visited.
reply_text: thank you for your valuable feedback mam....
